'''Nature's True Fruit''' is an item used to unlock the [[Sublime Spicewood]] realm layout in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It can be purchased from [[Tubby]] in the [[Realm Depot]] after completing the [[Archon Quest]] [[Chapter III]]: Act IV - [[King Deshret and the Three Magi]] quest ''[[Secret of the Scorching Desert]]''.
